title: Meditation: The Heart-Wisdom of Your Future Self (2021-09-29)
itunes:title: Meditation: The Heart-Wisdom of Your Future Self
description: Meditation: The Heart-Wisdom of Your Future Self (2021-09-29) -  In this meditation, we relax and open our body and mind, and then explore an encounter with our Future Self - facing Fear in a Traumatized World is the expression of our most evolved and awakened heart.
